TopicTitle: Hey, just started can i have some help?

Articles.Content:
Welcome to the KSP Forums!

If your looking for mods to download, check the Projects and Releases forum. Also, some fans have setup www.kerbalspacerepository.com.

Happy Launching!

Skunky
Step 1. Try not to explode. The kerbs hate that. You're welcome. =)

Step 1. Try not to explode. The kerbs hate that.

Except Jebediah, who is ambivalent about the concept.

Except Jebediah, who is ambivalent about the concept.

Actually, explosions are the only thing that will upset Jeb. He's got nerves of steel.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

Actually, explosions are the only thing that will upset Jeb. He's got nerves of steel.

Yeah, but if they're not right under him he's all 'WHEEEEEE!'. So -- ambivalent
In 0.9, Jeb should be wearing cool shades like this -> 8)

boosters, fuel tanks, decals, etc

Strap em on, light em up and pray for their Kerbal souls.

Welcome aboard.

At this point, unlocking further parts is done by downloading mods--the game is currently in 'sandbox' state, where you have unlimited access to everything available.

Dunno what the planned method for unlocking stuff in the future 'campaign mode' will be...
